Went there for the 2nd time, this time for my wife's birthday, who's a minion lover. We called them earlier to book but apparently they do not allow bookings. So told them we would be coming at 6:30pm, they said they would help us get seats when we were there. Unfortunately dhaka traffic played us and we were 2.5 hours late!! However in the meantime we had a couple of attendees already there and they accepted our order. So soon after reaching the place we got our food. The food was really good. We had the hanging chicken with rice/pasta. The chicken with rice was a really good combo (350tk) and we also found the pasta to be really good. Overall a good experiance.

I hitted 3 stars because i think overall is good. First of all I would just like to thank you for the fantastic evening we spent at your restaurant on Sunday 24th September 2017. Secondly i would like to say that I & my friends ordered BBQ chicken with Fried rice. Specially thanks for your service and your decoration was well decorated and i love that place. Your food quality was average and i didn't find any specialty from that food. Last but not least we had a great time and really appreciated the live entertainment too!â€œ Best of luck for your restaurant...

Pizza was very good.. but pasta was worse, it was smell like cow's fat. They serve tomato sauces in a tiny plate..this is really irritating. You have to ask them several times for sauces. Overall environment was good. Staffs are sincere.

So for my sister's birthday, we ordered takeout of the BBQ platter for four and got enough food to feed at least 6 people. To be honest, the food was mostly excellent. The Mexican rice was splendid. The chicken wings and the chicken sizzling were finger licking good. We found the green sauce too spicy, especially for those who can't consume spicy food. The disappointment was the BBQ chicken which weren't barbequed at all! There was no searing on the outside, the char a barbequed chicken is supposed to have was nonexistent. There was zero spice in it. Also, we found hair in several dishes which is totally unacceptable. I hope in future you'll improve your dishes more. Keep up the good work with the rice, the chicken wings and the chicken sizzling but please be more sincere about the quality and hygiene of your food.

Soi 71 Uttara has one of the best ambiences. And truly their behaviour is very much welcoming. Their online response was very helpful. And the Bento Box for Iftar should be a permanent meal in the menu for the other days. Because I loved it as lunch today! Cheers.
excellent food. I strongly recommend. the food and also the environment.please check it out .I love it. keep up the good work.

Soi 71 at Uttara is a fine dining of Thai food bonanza at Uttara. It's located in the centre of Uttara, round about of Uttara 7, 11 & 13. The ambience of the restaurant is spectacular especially in the open area where Charcoal barbecue is done in front of the customers. It welcomes every customer individually with warm and cordial way offering mouth watering and tasty welcome drinks. The well trained staff know their job to satisfy the customers with service. Chefs know how to pamper their customer with fine dining and delicacies. The hot and spicy Tom yam soup has parallel, succulent and crispy fried chicken..... True and authentic Thai cuisine is their strength as well as pride in the city. They have wide array of the best picked Thai dishes in their menu. They won the hearts of food lovers. Cheers to Soi 71 at Uttara.

One of the most customer-friendly places comparative to other restaurants I have visited within Dhaka. I along with two more people went there (mirpur branch) to avail unlimited pizza offer at about 6:40 pm without even booking & obviously it was houseful. We were wandering here & there & then the manager approached to us on his own & suggested to have iftar in staff room. We agreed as there was no other option left. Dates, rooh-afza & cold drinks were quickly served & just before azaan, two slices of pizza were given to each of us. Eventually they were serving pizzas of different flavor (8 flavors) after every while & the manager was repeatedly saying sorry that we had to have iftar in staff room. Though they had to serve a lot of pizzas to a huge number of crowd but still taste was not degraded.

The environment was great, liked their servicesâ€‹ and they all were well mannered! Some people had bad experienceâ€‹ about their servicesâ€‹ but this wasn't the case for me. Actually they were great for me. Whatever lets talk about the food! 1st of all there wasn't 50 items as they claimedâ€‹! And most of the items were good but not the best!! Fried rice and noodles and chicken chili was great. That tikka item was great. The biggest downfall is, there wasn't any beef or sizzling items!! I didn't liked the pasta...it was bad! And you guys should add more desserts please, Because the dessertsâ€‹ sucked big time! I would never recommend shemai and firni in a buffet menu!! At least throw some cakes or chocolates. This is by far the best pizzas I've had here at BD. Made by a man full of passion and dedication, I'd rate this a 10/10. The presentation of the pizza is beautiful. Its very neat and pleasing to the eye. I personally had the BBQ chicken pizza and the shrimp pizza and it tastes amazing. The meat is well cooked and tender. The meat alone tastes outstanding. The texture of the pizza is wonderful. Though it is layered by the sauce and meat and the cheeses on top, it still holds everything in place. It doesnt get soggy or soft which is essential for a good pizza. And not to forget, every bite gives you a very satisfying cheese pull which is to die for ðŸ˜ Overall, i would highly recommend.

A person who knows me can tell that I just live for good food and I love eating at different places where it is a 5 star or anything else. The Friday brunch of Four Points by Sheraton is awesome to treat yourself after a hectic week. It is a place which is very soothing and their staffs will make sure that you'll feel cozy there. I have been to Le MÃ©ridien, Westin and Raddison too but if you ask me which place serves you the best food then I'll say it is Four Points by Sherat...on. Now let's talk about the food, the best thing they will serve you is live juice station from the entire brunch session. The live kitchen has a variety of items to offer and to me the prawn tempura and the omelette with cheese were the best. They also serve you live pasta station. I had the best white sauce pasta with cheese, spices and chicken today. It was so yummy that I had the desire to start licking the plate. The main dishes were yummy too. The main thing is they will set a line of main dishes that you will want to eat like no dishes you'll not want to eat. I had a very good experience today there and I highly recommend this place.
Their complimentary beverages services need to be improved.

I like the most is they did not put tons of variety rather quality foods and all that you can eat. All the stuffs are very friendly, they keep asking the guests if they need anything more. 3 of us attended for lunch. The decor was minimalist but clean. The waiters were pleasant but need proper training. As this is a new cuisine for most of us, we had to ask for recommendations. This was not voluntarily offered. Even after we advised them of our lack of knowledge about Sri Lankan food. The waiter appeared to suggest the most expensive dishes as opposed dishes that we'd like considering we were describing what we were in the mood for. Ordering the food was a chal...lenge. We ordered a set menu they had available as this would provide the most selection. We also ordered parathas, egg hoppers and a beef curry. The waiters did not make suggestions that we'd need to order this additional food but it was essential for a full meal. It took over 20 minutes for the food to arrive. Once it did, I admit it was tasty but most of it was very spicy. We were not aware of this. We can handle spice but we still would've appreciated the waiters making us aware of it. The staff mentioned 3/4 of our way through the meal that we had two drinks which came with the set menu that we'd ordered. Whether this was done to make us order more drinks or whether the waiters forgot....both are unattractive. The set menu was priced in a manner I would say appropriate but the curry was overpriced. It cost just under 4000tk for 3 of us and in all consideration, this was a tad over what we would've felt was appropriate. I hope the suggestions are considered thoughtfully. I enjoyed the food so we shall be back, inshallah.
The food was fantastic ,too spicy,too yummy ï¿½ I'll visit you again ï¿½ï¿½

Ami aj'k khabar order korsi " HAKKA KITCHEN " theke.. Normally ami review dei na.. Khabar order kore kheye feli.. Kintu aj'k oder aikhan theke khabar anaye kheye mone hoilo.. Aak review to banta hai.. ï¿½ï¿½ Shorbo prothom bolte chai.. Oder home delivery "FREE".. jei shobdo 'ta amar kichhu kinte gele kenar shomoi shunle khushi hoye jai.. ï¿½ï¿½ r akta jeita hoilo "NO vat" all including.. ï¿½ï¿½ So dui 'ta bepar 'e achhe.. Shudhui khabarer bill 'ta pay korte hobe.. Uufff extra koto gula ...tk baicha gelo oikhane jawar vara shoho ï¿½ï¿½ .. Aibar boli khabar niye.. Ami order korechhi oder set menu theke "TAKE AWAY - 2" ..jei khane achhe.. 1. Vegetable Egg Fried Rice - 4.9/5 (valoi kintu ï¿½) 2. Fried Chicken (1piece) - 4.7/5 (Uummm yum ï¿½) 3. Spicy Cashew Nut Chicken - 4.8/5 (beshi joss ï¿½ï¿½ specially jokhon crispy cashew nuts gula mukhe burst kore ï¿½ï¿½) 4. Mixed Vegetables - 4.5/5 ( Nice ï¿½ï¿½) R shathe pachhen akta yummy "chili sauce" free ï¿½ï¿½ So overall it's a very good package that you can get in.. only " 250/- " ..wow ï¿½ï¿½ So guys you can try it.. ï¿½ï¿½ And a complete 5ï¿½ goes for their hospitality.. ï¿½ï¿½ Awesome experience.. ï¿½ï¿½

We had the following (opposite NSU main gate 1 & 2): 1 Beef Burger = 99 Taka. Was pretty good. Loved the buns they use. The patty was good for the price range, despite being doused with a lot of sauce. Also, it is a very messy burger so make sure you get tissues. 2 Chicken Burgers = 198 Taka. The chicken burger is definitely the best item on the menu. Delicious patty which complements the soft sesame buns. They use the same sauces for both the beef and chicken burgers. Howeve...r, the sauce combo tastes much better with the chicken patty. 1 Beef Kebab = 99 Taka. The packaging is nice, the kabab wrap is decent. It is definitely not worth getting this for 99 taka. Also, the beef kebab has star anise in it, so if you don't like the smell of star anise, stay away from it! 1 Chicken Kebab = 99 Taka. Again, the chicken version is much better than the beef version. Still not worth 99 taka IMO. The meat to veggie ratio is waaaay off. They need to put more meat in this to be worth 99 taka. Tastes pretty good though. 1 Mountain Dew = 60 Taka. Regular fountain drink glass (not the tiny ones they give you at KFC or other places). Expensive yes, however it was pretty refreshing. Tasted like proper mountain dew (not some watered down version of it). Recommendations = stick to the chicken burgers. Definitely worth it!

went to Baba rafi 300 feet Bashundhara r/a they only serve 100 and 160 tk combo burger deal! One of the best burger in that price,, but i have to give points to fries,,its similar to Mcdonalds fries and Hungry Jacks i had in Australia. Beef Burger was juicy and the sauce they used was really nice with a hint of Garlic Im gonna be honest, i had most amount of burgers around dhaka from banani, malibag and mirpur, dhanmondi and 300 feet... Baba rafi beats all in price and taste and with excellent cooked fries! Top quality. Thats why i had two burgers!! N.B- every place we been to, customer service is never satisfactory, but this girl in baba rafi,,,she was kind, explainable and also served with smile where she was wearing hijab and with decency,,,5star for because she did that. Thanks for the experience. keep up the good work!

Now this is confusing . How can a shop have 68 5 stars and 34 1 stars? Some r sayin faltu, shit, rotten meat, served cold. Some are sayin they didnt find any meat in it, it was just tomato n onion or even thr service is slower than granny . N some r saying this is the best burger in town, nothing is better than this. Tune & Bite Music Cafe Khilgaon is one of the most popular places to hang out in the Heart of Dhaka for all types of party lovers. This is an ideal place to hang out with Friends or passing a good time with Family Members. They has Distinct Seating Areas including a live music court. The eye-catching lounge is perfectly built friend gatherings or every types of family programs . It is the epitome of class and elegance, with interiors adorned by famous singers photo and maxim.... Interiors are superfluous with best rolling Stone magazines cover backdrop, the kitchen is really hygienic and the washrooms are neat and clean. In one word, the space is just beautiful. The menu has different types of delicious food items. They provide their best services to make you feel wow by yammi food with music. They always offer some of the best dishes from its affordable and budget-friendly menu. Best value proposition according to the price of Food. Some time they throw offers for discount over dishes. If you are lucky enough, you can avail those. Staffs are very much friendly and well mannered. Besides, the owner is also very polite, cordial and helpful minded. As there plays a lot of live music so it helps to create a groove atmosphere. They have the best studio and audio system for live music. Nice collection of Music can make anyone fan of this restaurant. Overall this is an awesome place amongst youngsters and people who want to experience the nightlife with live music and special menu. All this benefits has made this restaurant extraordinary and worthwhile visit for everyone.

Such a environment to dine and enjoy music live! Those who are searching better place to sit and eat. Please come here. Food is 9/10, service 9/10. Thanks to arrange a such restaurant @Dhaka city. Wish for its success.

Tha Interior is in a word too much Rock n Rolla for a music-cafe.... the ambience is super.... nd the best part of a restaurant is the price-taste-quantity combo....here Tune & Bite cafe rocks... price is worthy...
